name: Slime Bath
description:
Slime bath is a slime management game that challenge you to cool/heat your slimes accordingly. Keep playing to unlock the levels which will be even more challenging than before.

You will need good reaction and planning skills in order to get the highest score!

  • Drag slimes to cool/heat them off
  • Unlock new levels to raise the challenge
  • Get the highest score possible!

An entry for a local game jam
